parameters.name: ContainerItems
parameters.description: List of container names that need to be whitelisted.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Reason
parameters.description: The reason why you add the risk item to the whitelist.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description:
The data source. Valid values:

*   **default**: host baseline
*   **agentless**: agentless baseline

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The operation that you want to perform on the risk item.Valid values:
*  **1**: adds the risk item to the whitelist
*  **2**: removes the risk item from the whitelist

parameters.name: UuidList
parameters.description:
The UUIDs of the servers.

> You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~DescribeCloudCenterInstances~~) operation to query the UUIDs of servers.
